alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Leon; Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 07 at 4:17PM EDT until July 07 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Wakulla County in Big Bend of Florida... Southwestern Jefferson County in Big Bend of Florida... Southeastern Leon County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 515 PM EDT. * At 417 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Woodville, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Woodville, St. Marks, Crawfordville, Wakulla, Newport, Cody, Shadeville, Hells Half Acre, Wakulla Springs, Eight Mile Pond, Thomas City, Panacea, Medart, Wacissa, Wacissa Springs, Bethel, Natural Bridge, Liveoak Island, Goose Pasture and Hyde Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
